name: Dottie's Sausage, Mushroom and Cream Cheese Chicken Casserole
ingredients: Salt, pepper and garlic powder, to taste

instructions.en: Season chicken; brown in hot oil. Set aside.
Brown sausage and celery; drain and cool slightly.
Preheat oven to 350ยบ. Spray a 9x13" baking pan and put mushrooms in the bottom.
Mix sausage, cream cheese, 4 ounces cheddar cheese and parsley in a bowl.
Spoon mixture over mushrooms and smooth. Place chicken on top.
Remove cover; top with remaining cheese.
Bake 15 minutes until cheese is melted and browned and chicken is cooked.

notes: Makes 8 servings. Do not freeze. To serve, put chicken on a plate cheese side up; spoon mushroom mixture over the top.
